name: Calvin ward
coverLetter: Been trimming for about 7 years. Looking for a weekend shift. Can trim 1- 2 pounds depending on size of nugs. Very steadfast and thorough worker. Does thr job until its finished. And have reliable transportation. Do not smoke at the time. But that just motivates me to work harder and faster. Contact me if you need more info or have a start date you would like me to start. Phone number 9718649192
